VII.i.1.C.3.e
.
Requirement to Notify a Child’s Custodian
Provide a notice of proposed adverse action to the custodian of any child whose rate of payment is adversely affected by a change in the status of a child or children on other awards.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section C - Adjusting Awards for Dependents
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section C
